mutants.code:
import os

def get_common_suffix(phrases):
    reversed_phrases = [phrase[::-1] for phrase in phrases]
    reversed_common_suffix = os.path.commonprefix(reversed_phrases)
    return reversed_common_suffix[::+1]

import os

def get_common_suffix(phrases):
    reversed_phrases = [phrase[::+1] for phrase in phrases]
    reversed_common_suffix = os.path.commonprefix(reversed_phrases)
    return reversed_common_suffix[::-1]

import os

def get_common_suffix(phrases):
    reversed_phrases = [phrase[::--1] for phrase in phrases]
    reversed_common_suffix = os.path.commonprefix(reversed_phrases)
    return reversed_common_suffix[::-1]
